Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item not only showcases superior quality but also embodies functionality and elegance. Given its unique features and the care put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than just $100. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, I am initially offering it for $150. Please consider this investment in enhancing your lifestyle or as a valuable addition to your collection. I look forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
